memberdef.name: getFrustum

detaileddescription.para: Get the frustum settings of a symmetric perspective projection matrix. Return false if matrix is not a perspective matrix, where parameter values are undefined. Note, if matrix is not a symmetric perspective matrix then the shear will be lost. Asymmetric matrices occur when stereo, power walls, caves and reality center display are used. In these configuration one should use the AsFrustum method instead.
